name: Dragonboy (Serendevity)
description:
Submission for WeeklyGameJam 98, with the theme: Tame a dragon.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Crouch - Left Shift
Place bait - E
Capture dragon - SPACE

Credits:
Everything except music - Serendevity (twitter: @Seren_devity)

"Neo Western" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
